entries.cant_work: I need someone who will dedicate themselves to my assignments. Come back when you are not as occupied.
entries.dontknowyou_2: Away with you. I am on a mission from my clan.
entries.next: I have nothing further for you at present.
entries.npc_1_1: Are you here to help, offworlder? I have little time for you if you're not. One of my rancors has escaped from its pen. These creatures take years to train and I don't want to lose all the work that went into this one. Could you help me get it back?
entries.npc_1_2: It appears that Singing Mountain Clan has been raiding our territory looking for rancor nests. They are probably also responsible for freeing the rancors from their pens. I need someone to wipe this raiding party out. Could you handle that?
entries.npc_2_1: My scouts reported unusual rancor activity in this area. Go and check it out. If you find my rancor, bring it back here.
entries.npc_2_2: Head to these coordinates. The Singing Mountain Clan's raiding party should be there. Wipe them all out. This will not be easy so you might wish to bring allies.
entries.npc_3_1: Why do you waste my time then? Away with you.
entries.npc_3_2: I believe you are correct. You probably can't handle a Singing Mountain Clan raiding party.
entries.npc_4_1: Normally yes, but I've sprayed you with a musk that the rancor will recognize. You will be safe and it will follow you back here. Will you do it?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Why are you just standing around?
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Ogling me won't help you accomplish this goal.
entries.npc_breech_2: A stranger approaches, sisters! Be on your guard!
entries.npc_failure_1: I've just lost years of hard work and training. I must investigate how this rancor escaped from its pen.
entries.npc_failure_2: I must find a way to dispose of this raiding party. Perhaps I will go personally.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Let me verify these coordinates with my scouts. Return in a few moments.
entries.npc_noloc_2: I must verify the coordinates with my scouts. Come back in a few moments.
entries.npc_reset: I do not have time for those who cannot finish what they begin. If that changes, you may see me again.
entries.npc_reward_1: You have done well. Take this as compensation for your efforts.
entries.npc_reward_2: Well done. You are efficient, for an offworlder. Claim your reward.
entries.npc_work_1: Have you found my rancor? I do not wish our rivals to claim this beast.
entries.npc_work_2: Have you destroyed that raiding party? They must be stopped.
entries.player_3_1: Wouldn't the rancor eat me if I approached it?
entries.player_reset: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Return the escaped rancor back to Fath Hray.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: Report your success back to Fath Hray.
entries.waypoint_description_2: Wipe out the Singing Mountain Clan raiding party.
entries.npc_reset_1: I do not have time for those who cannot finish what they begin. If that changes, you may see me again.
entries.npc_reset_2: I do not have time for those who cannot finish what they begin. If that changes, you may see me again.
entries.npc_reset_3: I do not have time for those who cannot finish what they begin. If that changes, you may see me again.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
